mapper.select: select orderId, memberId, orderRec, memberAddr1, memberAddr2, memberAddr3, orderPhone, orderDate, shipPrice, totalPrice, (select definition from sjb_order_state where sjb_order_state.orderState = sjb_order.orderState) as state ,shipDate, clearDate from sjb_order where memberId = #{memberId};

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, orderId, memberId, orderRec, memberAddr1, memberAddr2, memberAddr3, orderPhone, orderDate, shipPrice, totalPrice, (select definition from sjb_order_state where sjb_order_state.orderState = sjb_order.orderState) as state ,shipDate, clearDate from (select @rownum:=0) as rownum, sjb_order where memberId = #{memberId} order by rownum desc) sjb_order
where rownum >(#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount} and rownum<=#{pageNum}*#{amount} ;
select orderId, orderDetailId, productId, (select title from sjb_book where sjb_book.productId = sjb_order_detail.productId) as productName, amount from sjb_order_detail where orderId = #{orderId}
select count(*) from sjb_order where memberId = #{memberId}
